channel.title: Why is this site so fast?
channel.description:
Why is this site so fast?
I am at my dad's house, which has broadband limited to 64kbps, yet this site always loads so fast it is like broadband. Yet, all of the other sites on my dads connection take like 20 mins to load.
What has mopar done to make this site so fast??? Teach me your ways.

[/quote]

They don’t do sotw winners no more here?

item.title: Why is this site so fast?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Normally the internet is at like 3000kbps but when we go over the limits, it limits to 64kbps.

I like it how at my mum’s place, we get like 10-15mbps all the time with no limit.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

Our forums are just so awesome that the internet just assumes your going to come here, and preloads the site.

So in short, Magic.
